name: St. Felix of Valois

locations.description: Co-founded the Order of the Most Holy Trinity (Trinitarians) in France

summary: Felix of Valois was a French Catholic priest who co-founded the Order of the Most Holy Trinity (Trinitarians) with St. John of Matha. The order was dedicated to ransoming Christian captives. He spent much of his life as a hermit before joining John of Matha in establishing the order.
